original_text: Jeroboam and all the people returned to Rehoboam after three days. That was because the king had said, ‘Return to me in three days.’
korean_text: 삼 일 만에 여로보암과 모든 백성이 르호보암에게 나왔으니 이는 왕이 명령하여 이르기를 삼 일 만에 내게로 다시 오라 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: Jeroboam and all the people returned to Rehoboam
That was because the king had said
Return to me in three days
